name: [Ludum Dare 50] Don't Freeze
description:
Don't Freeze by P1x3lc0w (for Ludum Dare 50)

Delay the inevitable: The Fire that keeps you from freezing to death will eventually burn out. How long will you be able to stay alive? Don't Freeze.

-= Controls =-

Move with [W], [A], [S] and [D]

Shoot with [LMB] or [1]

Use your spread shot with [2] if you have unlocked it.

Use your flare with [3] if you have unlocked it.

Made using the Godot Game Engine and C#. Sprites made using Aseprite. SFX made using sfxr. Music made using Bosca Ceoil.

Color Palette "Sirens at Night" by avianAnnihilator: https://lospec.com/palette-list/sirens-at-night

Font "Press Start 2P" by CodeMan38: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P
